$DOT This may be sad and good at the same time but I think this is the era of upgrades and tech bot the era of price action and it started since the beginning of 2025 and probably will continue until the end of 2026 or 2027 when bull cycle begins and take its course. It means the devs are heavily focusing on the tech and ignoring the price. Just my two cents. Plus we might see a correction to 3$ soon cuz it's impossible to keep dropping for 3-4 consecutive months without consolidating to the upside even if the final target is 0.5$ for this coin. There is nothing such as pump to 4$ from here by one single 1d candle or dump to 0.5$ by one single 1d candle unless it's a scam and I believe Polkadot isn's scam. Nothing of it looks like scam. Scam coins are pretty obvious by their price movement , fundementals etc. Don't believe whoever claims it's going to 0.5$ or 1$ tomorrow or soon and don't believe whoever claims it will hit 10$-20$ tomorrow or soon even if it consolidates this late crash and tests 3$-4$. None of them knows sh about F. We have a target, possibly 1$ but not if we don't retest 3$ first and possibly 4$. This is bear market or downtrend correct but no red candles are followed by red candles for ever, there are green days ahead and I assume that's Jan and Feb to consolidate this dump then from there down we go.

#Polkadot's DOT slips 4.5% as token underperforms wider crypto markets

$DOT has already faced a clear rejection from the 1.77‚Äì1.78 supply zone, followed by a strong impulsive drop. Since then, price is struggling to build any meaningful recovery and is forming lower highs with weak bounces, which shows sellers are still in control.
The current structure looks like bearish consolidation after a dump, not accumulation. Buyers are stepping in near 1.71‚Äì1.72, but the reaction is weak and easily absorbed by sellers. Until price reclaims key resistance, shorts remain the higher-probability scalp.

üìå When would trend change?
Only if $DOT reclaims and holds above 1.76 ‚Äì 1.78 with strong volume. Below this zone, downside scalps remain favored.
$DOT  exit scam

$DOT Guys guys guys, just because I will sell my bags doesn't mean I will stop posting here üòÇ my initial goal was to warn newcommers not to invest in this scam, so it doesn't matter if I sell or not. 

Point of holding was to prove it was not a good investment and serve as an exemple for uninformed people that might willing to buy DOT what will be the outcome for them if they do so. If they listen to paid shillers ü§° in this sub they will loose their money for this scam like I did, this is not acceptable. 

Until this scam is done I will continue to post everyday and expose the lies in this project to prevent the maximum people not to invest in this garbage..

$DOT  WagieWojak: I know exactly what you think. Let me tell you why you're here. You're here because you know something. What you know, you can't explain. But you feel it. You felt it your entire crypto life. That there's something wrong with this project. You don't know what it is, but it's there. Like a splinter in your mind -- driving you mad. It is this feeling that has brought you to me. Do you know what I'm talking about? NewCommer: Polkadot ? WW: Do you want to know what it is? (Newcommer nods his head.) WW: The DOT is everywhere, it is all around us. Even now, in this very room. You can see it when you look out your window, or when you turn on your television. You can feel it when you go to work, or when go to church or when you pay your taxes. It is the world that has been pulled over your eyes to blind you from the truth. NC: What truth? WW: That you are an exit liquidity, dummy. Like everyone else in this project, you bought into hope, self locked inside a prison that you cannot smell, taste, or touch. A prison for your mind and your savings. Unfortunately, no one can be told what Polkadot is. You have to see it for yourself. This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. (In his left hand, Wagie shows a blue pill.) WW: You take the blue pill and the story ends. You wake in your bed to a new dump and believe whatever you want to believe about a JAM or a Polkadot App or whatever. (a red pill is shown in his other hand) You take the red pill and you stay in Wonderland and I show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes. (Long pause; NC begins to reach for the red pill)  WW : Remember -- all I am offering is the truth, nothing more. (NC takes the red pill and swallows it with a glass of water).. To be continued...
